Statute.Title: Income Tax Act, An Act to amend
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Impôt sur le revenu, Loi de l’ (loi modificative))

Heading.Label: Part I
Heading.Text: repealed, see R.S., Schedule (5th Supp.) for extent of repeal and 1994, c. 21, s. 122 see also Table of Public Statutes dated 31.12.93 for amendments prior to repeal

Heading.Label: Part IV
Heading.Text: amendments to pre-1972 Income Tax Act

Transitional.Text: Transitional, R.S., c. 2 (5th Supp.), ss. 69 to 78 re application

CIF.Text: CIF, R.S., Schedule (5th Supp.) in force 01.03.94 see SI/94‑19
CIF, R.S., c. 2 (5th Supp.), ss. 69 to 78 in force 01.03.94 see SI/94‑19
CIF, 1994, c. 21, s. 122 deemed in force 01.03.94
